metadata.name: ∟Δ›∩—Σ
metadata.description:
«My body moved freely and spontaneously. I felt totally free. She appeared to me in that ecstatic moment of dance. Surrounded by beautiful people. Being one with the music. She embodied the magic of sound waves that blinded me for a second through that retro disco ball. She said her name is ∟Δ›∩—Σ.»


«ANIMA» are the entities that exist in the world in the form of light. They reveal themselves in rare and elusive moments of life. For a tiny second. When you are truly happy, present, absorbed by the creative process, united with someone you love or walk barefoot on the wet grass. Look deeply within yourself and the nature around. And you’ll meet them.

They radiate their light towards freedom, peace and saving lives. 50% of collected funds will go to UNITED24 – the initiative of the President of Ukraine. The donations will be reported on my Twitter and Instagram. 

Painted and animated in Procreate.
Sound design by g : d .
